item.title: The Reporting on the Gaza War Is Fundamentally Broken
item.description: ‘Colonizer’ bad. ‘Colonized’ good. This worldview has warped coverage to an alarming degree.

item.title: Mike Johnson downplays Musk's influence and says Republicans will pass Trump's tax and budget bill
item.description: With an uncharacteristic feistiness, Speaker Mike Johnson took clear sides Sunday in President Donald Trump's breakup with mega-billionaire Elon Musk.

item.title: ABC correspondent suspended after bashing Trump, Miller as 'world-class' haters
